plot outline: A mystery thriller cum Love story, where the protagonist working in an MNC frustrated of work load in the office plans for the weekend trip with is other 7 friends. When traveling for the destination of the weekend trip, they miss their road and their vehicles gets in problem and doesn't start, so their plans to stay their in a nearby lonely farmhouse. In that house they face many difficult situations and few of their friends die, and one of his friend get away from that farmhouse, and how they come out of this situation is the plot of the story.
title: Aavahayami
plot: A mystery thriller cum Love story, where the protagonist working in an MNC frustrated of work load in the office plans for the weekend trip with is other 7 friends. When traveling for the destination of the weekend trip, they miss their road and their vehicles gets in problem and doesn't start, so their plans to stay their in a nearby lonely farmhouse. In that house they face many difficult situations and few of their friends die, and one of his friend get away from that farmhouse, and how they come out of this situation is the plot of the story.::Rathish Kumar B
